methods.name: CancelMovement
methods.description: Cancels The movement by its id.

methods.name: GetBottomPostion
methods.description: Gets the component bottom postion.

methods.name: GetComponentX
methods.description: Gets component X position.

methods.name: GetComponentY
methods.description: Gets component Y position.

methods.name: GetLeftPostion
methods.description: Gets the component left postion.

methods.name: GetPaddingBottom
methods.description: Gets the bottom padding of any component you want.

methods.name: GetPaddingLeft
methods.description: Gets the left padding of any component you want.

methods.name: GetPaddingRight
methods.description: Gets the right padding of any component you want.

methods.name: GetPaddingTop
methods.description: Gets the top padding of any component you want.

methods.name: GetRightPostion
methods.description: Gets the component right postion.

methods.name: GetRotation
methods.description: Gets the rotation of the component.

methods.name: GetRotationX
methods.description: Gets the rotation X of the component.

methods.name: GetRotationY
methods.description: Gets the rotation Y of the component.

methods.name: GetScaleX
methods.description: Gets the scale X of the component.

methods.name: GetScaleY
methods.description: Gets the scale Y of the component.

methods.name: GetShadowElevation
methods.description: Gets the Shadow Elevation of any component you want.

methods.name: GetTopPostion
methods.description: Gets the component top postion.

methods.name: GetZ
methods.description: Sets the Z postion of any component you want.

methods.name: IsMovementPaused
methods.description: Returns true if The current movement by its id is paused.

methods.name: IsMovementRunning
methods.description: Returns true if The current movement by its id is running.

methods.name: MoveHorizontally
methods.description: Moves any component you want vertically.

methods.name: MoveInCustomPath
methods.description: Moves any component you want in custom path.

methods.name: MoveVertically
methods.description: Moves any component you want vertically.

methods.name: PauseMovement
methods.description: Pauses The current movement.

methods.name: PerformClick
methods.description: Performs a click on any component you want.

methods.name: PerformLongClick
methods.description: Performs a long click on any component you want.

methods.name: RegisterComponent
methods.description: Register component so the extension can detect touches on it.

methods.name: ResumeMovement
methods.description: Resumes The current movement by its id.

methods.name: SetBottomPostion
methods.description: Sets the bottom postion of any component you want.

methods.name: SetLeftPostion
methods.description: Sets the left postion of any component you want.

methods.name: SetPadding
methods.description: Sets the padding of any component you want.

methods.name: SetRightPostion
methods.description: Sets the right postion of any component you want.

methods.name: SetRotation
methods.description: Changes the rotation of any component you want.

methods.name: SetRotationX
methods.description: Changes the rotation X of any component you want.

methods.name: SetRotationY
methods.description: Changes the rotation Y of any component you want.

methods.name: SetScaleX
methods.description: Changes the scale X of any component you want.

methods.name: SetScaleY
methods.description: Changes the scale Y of any component you want.

methods.name: SetShadowElevation
methods.description: Set the Shadow Elevation of any component you want.

methods.name: SetTopPostion
methods.description: Sets the top postion of any component you want.

methods.name: SetX
methods.description: Sets the X postion of any component you want.

methods.name: SetY
methods.description: Sets the Y postion of any component you want.

methods.name: SetZ
methods.description: Sets the Z postion of any component you want.

name: ComponentTools
helpString:
This extension offers some tools that you can use with components.
Devoloped by: Mohammed Tamer

events.name: Error
events.description: This event is triggerred when an error occurrs.

events.name: MoveCanceled
events.description: This event is triggerred when the current movement canceles.

events.name: MoveCompleted
events.description: This event is triggerred when the current movement ends.

events.name: MoveStarted
events.description: This event is triggerred when the current movement starts.

events.name: Touched
events.description: This event is triggerred when a component is touched.The action is returned in the action parameter.
